Load in CSV
```{r}
music <- read.csv("music_data.csv", header=TRUE)

# Remove the default 'X' column name for the song "index"
colnames(music)[1] <- ''
```

Remove Attributes
```{r}
music$artist_name <- NULL
music$track_name <- NULL
music$lyrics <- NULL
```
